Tanglebones.name: Tanglebones
Tanglebones.description:
Sometimes, when murderer buries a large number of victims in a mass grave, the vengeful spirits of the slain can become similarly tangled together. When these spirits can't untangle, they instead return to their physical remains, fusing into one horrific mass of bones and black, tar-like sludge-a tanglebones.

One awful tale speaks of a bitter old dowager who learned that, through a legal loophole, ownership of her estate would revert to her estranged daughter. She murdered her 13 servants, buried their bodies in the house's basement, and then played the gracious mother in handing over the manor keys at the appointed time. One night, the tanglebones that arose from the dowager's atrocity murdered the daughter and her family. By the time the authorities learned of what happened, the dowager had fled the nation, changed her identity, and (the story goes) wasted no time rebuilding her fortunes-this time becoming a queen.

qBfZKEJPVngf5Zs4.name: Ectoplasmic Filament
qBfZKEJPVngf5Zs4.description:
Trigger A creature within the tanglebone's reach uses an action with the manipulate trait or a move action, or leaves a square during a move action it's using

Effect A filament of black, oily ectoplasm lashes out at the triggering creature, dealing @Damage[(2d8+8)[slashing]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:25|basic] save). If the filament deals damage, the tanglebones gains [[/r 2d8 #Temporary Hit Points]]{2d8 temporary Hit Points}.

WarDVWwMegYTdbUM.name: Eerie Flexibility
WarDVWwMegYTdbUM.description: A tanglebones can shift and adjust its mass to fit into smaller areas, allowing it to fit through tight spaces as if it were a Medium creature. While Squeezing, it can move at its full Speed.

7GZSmH33lacIjGRG.name: Gnaw
7GZSmH33lacIjGRG.description:
Requirements The tanglebones has Grabbed a foe

Effect The tanglebones gnaws and chews on the grabbed target with its many skulls, dealing @Damage[(2d6+8)[piercing]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:23|basic] save). On a critical failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} from the pain.

uWMjBNMf2i8vkJza.name: Skeletal Storm
uWMjBNMf2i8vkJza.description: The tanglebones makes a single claw Strike against every creature in reach. These attacks count toward the tanglebones' multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after the tanglebones makes all its attacks.

dvswlRsKg8EGBzsU.name: Sprawled Bones
dvswlRsKg8EGBzsU.description: Until the next time it acts, the tanglebones appears as a sprawling mass of bones. It has an automatic result of 35 on Deception checks and DCs to pass as a grisly but seemingly harmless mess.

OpIusm2cr2cYc7x5.name: Clever Disguises
OpIusm2cr2cYc7x5.description: Ixirizmid can use Deception to impersonate any Medium humanoid creature, although creating such a disguise takes 1 hour. They can't impersonate a specific individual with this ability.

m3a767DfQxokefnk.name: No Breath
m3a767DfQxokefnk.description: Ixirizmid doesn't breathe and is immune to effects that require breathing (such as an inhaled poison).

FeDt6jCafBdwS5tk.name: Eviscerate
FeDt6jCafBdwS5tk.description:
Ixirizmid performs a swift and painful surgery on a creature it has grabbed or restrained, or who's otherwise immobilized. They roll a @Check[medicine|defense:fortitude] check against the target's Fortitude DC. Regardless of the result, the target then becomes temporarily immune to Eviscerate for 24 hours.

Critical Success The target takes @Damage[8d6[slashing]] damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round, and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (the mi-go chooses) for 24 hours.

Success The target takes @Damage[5d6[slashing]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round by the pain.

Failure The target takes @Damage[3d6[slashing]] damage.

Critical Failure The target takes no damage.

uffOMQdKncfhcXF7.name: Sneak Attack
uffOMQdKncfhcXF7.description: Ixirizmid deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

SqGN2C6WwW664mJx.name: Absorb Phantom Brain
SqGN2C6WwW664mJx.description:
Trigger The undead brain collector possesses at least 1 phantom brain after using Brainlash

Effect The undead brain collector absorbs [[/r 1d4 #Phantom Brains]]{1d4} of its phantom brains, gaining [[/r 1d8 #Temporary Hit Points]]{1d8 temporary Hit Points} for each brain it absorbed.

wsEjPohcBZ0DGWS5.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

CDTtHeFOvz7H1Jqo.name: Brainlash
CDTtHeFOvz7H1Jqo.description:
The undead brain collector extrudes a writhing tangle of ectoplasm from its bursted brain blisters. These ectoplasmic strands lash out at all living targets within 30 feet. Targets in this area must attempt a @Check[will|dc:25] save.

After the undead brain collector uses this ability, seven phantom brains glow and shimmer where its brain blisters once were. It can't use Brainlash again until all seven phantom brains are Absorbed.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[4d6[mental]] damage.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[8d6[mental]] damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[8d6[mental]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}.

MMSZxMrXIdeCFlFq.name: Mind-Rotting Toxin
MMSZxMrXIdeCFlFq.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:25|basic]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d6[void]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[1d6[void]], stupefied 1, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[2d6[void]], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}, and slowed 1 (1 round)

Algea.name: Algea
Algea.description: Algeas protect (and sometimes retrieve) souls at risk of being claimed by other entities, particularly spellcasters who dabbled with otherworldly forces but never officially pledged their souls.

zaePCGVy6RdZ31CZ.name: See Magic
zaePCGVy6RdZ31CZ.description: An algea can see magic auras on creatures or objects that it can observe; it can't see magic auras on creatures or objects that are hidden from its view. It learns the schools of magic for all spells affecting creatures.

gOTq88NERumC1U4Q.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

iAp1BgBeTFhgvNEP.name: Grieving Aura
iAp1BgBeTFhgvNEP.description:
30 feet. A creature that begins its turn in the aura must attempt a @Check[will|dc:27] save. Undead take a -2 circumstance penalty to this saving throw. The creature is then temporarily immune to the grieving aura for 1 hour.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure For 1 round, the creature can't use reactions and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for that turn as it sobs uncontrollably.

Critical Failure As failure, but the effects lasts while the creature remains in the aura plus 1 minute.

idd2T28Lmct79QDu.name: Drain Magic
idd2T28Lmct79QDu.description: Whenever a creature fails its save against Frenzied Beaks, the algea attempts to counter a spell effect active on that creature (6th level, counteract check +22). The algea can choose which effect to attempt to counteract for each creature.

fmcgopzl3nvrBJkz.name: Frenzied Beaks
fmcgopzl3nvrBJkz.description: Each foe in the swarm's space takes @Damage[5d6[piercing]|traits:item:rune:property:ghost-touch] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:30|basic]) and is exposed to drain magic. This damage affects incorporeal creatures as if it had the effects of a ghost touch property rune.

dCra4dM2DaOP8GAK.name: Soul Cage
dCra4dM2DaOP8GAK.description:
An incorporeal undead damaged by Frenzied Beaks must attempt a @Check[will|dc:30] save.

Critical Success The undead is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Success The undead takes a -10-foot status penalty to Speeds for 1 round.

Failure As success, but the undead is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round, although it can attempt to Escape (DC 30).

Critical Failure The undead is restrained for 1 round. The algea can attempt to plane shift with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} creature even if that creature isn't willing, but an unwilling creature can attempt a Will save to resist @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Interplanar Teleport}. If it succeeds, the algea plane shifts and leaves the incorporeal creature behind, which is then no longer restrained.

C6cMjmVitcFqX2HU.name: Whispered Despair
C6cMjmVitcFqX2HU.description:
Trigger A creature with an active emotion effect enters an attic whisperer's aura of sobs

Effect The attic whisperer attempts to counteract the emotion effect, with a counteract modifier of +13.

NorEqWsgAqUEHrv0.name: Aura of Sobs
NorEqWsgAqUEHrv0.description:
10 feet. Anitoli Nostreaema enshrouds itself in a tapestry of stolen voices. Each living creature that enters or starts their turn in the aura must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:21] save or the unnerving, bitter sobs render them distraught and they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for as long as they remain within the aura. A creature that succeeds is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Anitoli Nostreaema can activate or deactivate the aura with a single free action, which has the concentrate trait.

F58s1zGhxWZhyyU7.name: Steal Breath
F58s1zGhxWZhyyU7.description:
Anitoli Nostreaema siphons the breath from living creatures, sapping their strength. A living creature hit by a jaws Strike must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:24] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 round.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 24 hours and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

Critical Failure The target is enfeebled 1 for 24 hours, is fatigued, and falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}.

FbJ6MpdH1KNP6DEP.name: Steal Voice
FbJ6MpdH1KNP6DEP.description:
When Anatoli Nostraema hits a living creature with a bony hand Strike, it tries to pull the victim's voice into its aura. The victim must attempt a @Check[will|dc:24] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's voice is weak for 1 minute. Anytime it attempts an action with the auditory trait, it must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] check or the action is lost.

Failure The target loses the ability to speak for 1 hour, until the curse is removed, or until the attic whisperer is destroyed, whichever comes first. During this time, the attic whisperer can perfectly mimic the target's voice, and the target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to saving throws against that attic whisperer's aura of sobs.

Critical Failure As failure, but the effects lasts until the attic whisperer is destroyed or the curse is removed.

WN5HCThXS1ilMtKI.name: Truespeech
WN5HCThXS1ilMtKI.description: The haunted nosoi speaks in Requian, the language of psychopomps, but all creatures hear its words in their native languages.

IbqmLczDaT9GKEuW.name: Vengeful Burst
IbqmLczDaT9GKEuW.description:
Trigger The haunted nosoi is destroyed or it enters a square adjacent to a corrupted psychopomp in area D5

Effect The haunted nosoi dies as it explodes into a burst of vitality energy. This heals all living creatures within 10 feet for @Damage[3d6[vitality]] damage.If triggered in area D5, the Vengeful Burst deals @Damage[2d12[void]] damage to any corrupted psychopomps in that area (@Check[will|dc:18|basic] save)

5RVQgrRnkm4C0Y2q.name: Drill Deeper
5RVQgrRnkm4C0Y2q.description:
Requirements Nils Kelveken hit a creature with a hand drill Strike with his previous action

Effect Nils grabs the drill and twists, drilling deeper into the victim. He automatically deals @Damage[1d8[piercing]] damage, and the creature being drilled into must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:22] save to avoid taking an additional @Damage[1d6[bleed]] (@Damage[2d6[bleed]] on a critical failure).

k5hfsPhHrFe43moo.name: I See What Ye Did!
k5hfsPhHrFe43moo.description:
Nils Strides up to his speed toward a target within 30 feet, shrieking "I seen what ye did!" at them as he approaches. The target must attempt a @Check[will|dc:22|name:I Seen What Ye Did!] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target becomes disturbed at what Nils might have seen and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure As success, but the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The target falls into a phantasmagoric nightmare state where time seems to slow down as they can think of nothing but running away, yet as fast as they try to flee, Nils can catch up with ease. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} at the start of its next turn and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} until the end of its next turn.

IS7sAzIDvMgfptk8.name: Consume Flesh
IS7sAzIDvMgfptk8.description:
Requirements The esobok ghoul is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour.

Effect The ghoul devours a chunk of the corpse and regains @Damage[3d6[healing]] Hit Points.

It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.

iFqu2IfRpOfYJiI2.name: Corrupted Touch
iFqu2IfRpOfYJiI2.description: An esobok ghoul's Strikes deal @Damage[1d6[void]] damage to living creatures. A creature critically hit by an esobok ghoul's Strike must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:18] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} on a critical failure) as rot spreads throughout their flesh.

ewbuoRukTnN5HwAa.name: Ghoul Fever
ewbuoRukTnN5HwAa.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:22]

Stage 1 carrier with no ill effect (1 day)

Stage 2 @Damage[2d6[void]] damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day)

Stage 3 as stage 2 (1 day)

Stage 4 @Damage[2d6[void]] damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day)

Stage 5 as stage 4 (1 day)

Stage 6 dead, and rises as a ghoul the next midnight.

i02LjkO2d05n1YxC.name: Paralysis
i02LjkO2d05n1YxC.description:
Any living, non-elf creature hit by a ghoul's attack must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:22] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}.

It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

iT8h3OAVXFRozXkw.name: Pounce
iT8h3OAVXFRozXkw.description: The esobok ghoul Strides and then makes a claw Strike. If it began this action hidden, it remains hidden until after the Strike.

OPfyi9ivt0InaEXb.name: Site Bound
OPfyi9ivt0InaEXb.description: Ioseff Xarwin is site bound to his laboratory.

66dtKIUqfelqC7kk.name: Recoil
66dtKIUqfelqC7kk.description:
If a character forcefully presents Fulvia's ring to Ioseff as an action with the manipulate trait, he must attempt a @Check[will|dc:26] save; he's thereafter immune to Recoil for 24 hours.

Critical Success Ioseff is unaffected.

Success Ioseff takes @Damage[4d6[mental]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure Ioseff takes @Damage[8d6[mental]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure Ioseff takes @Damage[8d6[mental]] damage, is frightened 2, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}.

AlPbxguovoxPTMet.name: Rejuvenation
AlPbxguovoxPTMet.description:
When a ghost is destroyed, it re-forms after [[/br 2d4 #days]]{2d4 days} within the location it's bound to, fully healed. A ghost can be permanently destroyed only if someone determines the reason for its existence and sets right whatever prevents the spirit from resting.

In order to put Ioseff to rest, the following three conditions must be met after defeating Ioseff but before he rejuvenates:

  • The undead brain collector in area D6 has been destroyed.
  • The brains of his wife and children have been freed from the brain collector statue, allowing their souls to move to the Boneyard.
  • The Void Mirror has been replaced in its frame in the Cosmic Crypt.

M7sVspfHZSCGkPB3.name: Shame
M7sVspfHZSCGkPB3.description: Ioseff takes a -1 item penalty to attack rolls and saving throws against a character who carries Fulvia's ring. This penalty doubles to -2 against a character who wears Fulvia's ring. At the start of ttheir turn, a character who possesses Fulvia's ring can attempt a secret @Check[perception|dc:20|traits:secret] check; on a success, they sense a faint compulsion fueled by outrage to present Fulvia's ring to the ghost.

oaQPnXy17nhfdQcU.name: Incite Insurrection
oaQPnXy17nhfdQcU.description:
Trigger A creature within 30 feet of Ioseff fails a saving throw against one of his spells

Effect Ioseff infuses the magic of his spell with the agonies of his own death. In addition to any effects caused by the triggering spell, the target must also attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:28|traits:disease] save. or contract internal insurrection at stage 1 (stage 2 on a critical failure)

Internal Insurrection (disease); Level 7.

The target can't recover from the clumsy condition from internal insurrection until the disease is cured

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 day)

Stage 3 clumsy 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} (1 day)

Stage 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 3} and off-guard (1 day)

Stage 5 death, and the target's body splits apart into a mass of fragments that crawls outward in a 10-foot-emanation before perishing, leaving a bare skeleton surrounded by gore.

tq4v9Tm2A5wAIhYF.name: Malevolent Possession
tq4v9Tm2A5wAIhYF.description:
Ioseff Xarwin attempts to possess an adjacent corporeal creature. This has the same effect as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{Possession} spell, except since Ioseff Xarwin doesn't have a physical body, it is unaffected by that restriction of the spell.

The target must attempt a @Check[will|dc:28|traits:controlling] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success You possess the target but can't control it. You ride along in the body while the spell lasts.

Failure You possess the target and take partial control of it. You no longer have a separate turn; instead, you might control the target. At the start of each of the target's turns, it attempts another Will save. If it fails, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} by you on that turn; if it succeeds, it chooses its own actions; and if it critically succeeds, it forces you out and the spell ends.

Critical Failure You possess the target fully, and it can only watch as you manipulate it like a puppet. The target is Controlled by you.

A character who carries Fulvia's ring on their person gains a +4 item bonus to their save and treats the result of the save as one degree of success better than their rolled result. If Ioseff attempts to use this ability on a character who wears Fulvia's ring, he can attempt a Perception check against the ring-wearer's Stealth DC to notice the ring in time to avoid the attempt; on a success, he loses the two actions he took to make the attempt but avoids further effects. If he doesn't notice the ring and attempts to possess the ring-wearer, the ring-wearer automatically gains a critical success on their Will save, Ioseff is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}, and he can't use Malevolent Possession again for 24 hours.

6mMJCH3VP87wzthp.name: Phantasmal Amputation
6mMJCH3VP87wzthp.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect Ioseff holds up the stump of his left arm, and the streaming blood begins to form a ghostly hand that he then uses to point out a humanoid creature within 30 feet. That creature must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:28|traits:necromancy,occult] save.

Critical Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} by a sudden, agonizing pain in their left hand.

Success As critical success, but the creature also takes @Damage[2d6[slashing]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round as they feel as if their left hand just got lopped off by a hatchet.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}, takes @Damage[5d6[slashing]] damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} for 1 minute as they feel as if their left hand just got lopped off by a hatchet.

Critical Failure The PC is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 3} and takes @Damage[8d6[slashing],2d6[bleed]]{8d6 slashing damage and 2d6 bleed damage} as their left hand appears to detach and fall to the floor before instantly decaying into bones. The PC is clumsy 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 1}. As soon as this wounded condition is removed, the PC's hand miraculously returns and the clumsy condition ends.

Zy5jqqY9EMBjp2KN.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Ls9yE1H6FkT1OJYn.name: Unnerving Presence
Ls9yE1H6FkT1OJYn.description:
30 feet. A creature that begins its turn within the aura must attempt a @Check[will|dc:22|basic] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and becomes temporarily immune to unnerving presence for 24 hours.

Success The creature's attack rolls take a -1 status penalty for 1 round.

Failure The creature feels Yianyin's eyeless gaze upon them but knows that something far more dangerous and monstrous watches them through those empty sockets. The overwhelming presence of this alien intelligence causes the creature to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round as they shake and tremble with fear.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature is instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} and knows the name of what watches from those empty eyes: Tchekuth.

45tIfcu3EgUSitRf.name: Compel Condemned
45tIfcu3EgUSitRf.description:
Yianyin telepathically compels a creature within 30 feet to approach and allow Yianyin to kiss them, in preparation for using Kiss of Death. The target must attempt a @Check[will|dc:25] save.

Success The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Compel Condemned for 24 hours.

Failure The creature must spend each of its actions to move closer to Yianyin as quickly as possible, while avoiding obvious dangers. If the compelled creature is adjacent to Yianyin, it stays still and doesn't act. If the creature takes any damage, the effect ends and the creature is temporarily immune to Compel Condemned for 24 hours. This effect lasts for 1 round, but if Yianyin uses this ability again on subsequent rounds, it extend the duration by 1 round for all affected creatures.

Critical Failure As failure, but damage does not end the effect.

NampMSngFfuFfsYt.name: Corrupted Touch
NampMSngFfuFfsYt.description: Yianyin's Strikes deal @Damage[2d6[void]] damage to living creatures. A creature critically hit by Yianyin's Strike must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:18|traits:void] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} on a critical failure) as rot spreads throughout their flesh.

kATbmBX9Ub3C8BqX.name: Kiss of Death
kATbmBX9Ub3C8BqX.description:
Yianyin gives a long, passionate kiss to an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} or willing creature, dealing @Damage[4d6[void]] damage.

Any creature damaged by Yianyin's Kiss of Death for 3 consecutive rounds becomes unconscious and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying 1}.

cWM3q0yWZ3nV2UKw.name: Drain Memory
cWM3q0yWZ3nV2UKw.description: When the manifestation damages a living creature with its spectral hand Strike, the manifestation gains 5 temporary Hit Points, and the target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:23|basic] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1}. Each time it deals damage to a creature, that creature's stupefied condition increases by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of stupefied 4.

0AEJAJ3AgrV5j4kM.name: Manor Bound
0AEJAJ3AgrV5j4kM.description: The manifestation can't leave Xarwin Manor or the dungeons below.

AOPfqLyhf0Xvpueq.name: +1 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Vitality

3f4ySQfrmtsGbvjo.name: Recoil
3f4ySQfrmtsGbvjo.description:
If a character forcefully presents Fulvia's ring to Xarwin's manifestation as an action with the manipulate trait, he must attempt a @Check[will|dc:26|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success Xarwin's manifestation is unaffected.

Success Xarwin's manifestation takes @Damage[4d6[mental]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure Xarwin' manifestation takes @Damage[8d6[mental]] damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Flees} as long as he remains frightened.

Critical Failure Xarwin's manifestation is destroyed.

yB0f6FaPo2u5bqwy.name: Haunting Touch
yB0f6FaPo2u5bqwy.description: When the manifestation critically hits a creature with its spectral hand Strike, the creature's malevolence condition value increases by 1.

qarlOKy2gtbDmhfN.name: Corrupted Touch
qarlOKy2gtbDmhfN.description: A corrupted nosoi's Strikes deal @Damage[1d6[void]] damage to living creatures. A creature critically hit by a corrupted nosoi's Strike must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:18] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} on a critical failure) as rot spreads through their flesh.

THAwoUoO7vQWUsob.name: Haunting Melody
THAwoUoO7vQWUsob.description:
The nosoi croons "the Lord slumbers below, you're nothing but his dreams, and when the lord awakes, you'll know the end of things!". Each living or undead creature within a @Template[emanation|distance:60] must attempt a @Check[will|dc:18] save. The effect lasts for 1 round, but a nosoi can use this ability again on subsequent rounds to extend the duration by 1 round for all affected creatures. A creature that succeeds at any save is temporarily immune for 24 hours. Despite being a mental effect, this ability affects mindless undead. Psychopomps are immune to this ability.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated}.

Critical Failure As failure, and the creature must spend each of its actions on its turn to move closer to the nosoi as expediently as possible while avoiding obvious dangers. If a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} creature is adjacent to the nosoi, it stays still and doesn't act. If the creature is attacked, the fascination ends.
